## Document repository for Coursera Data Science Specialization - Capstone project

### This github repository contains the documentation for the Capstone project:

1. Load-Data.R contains the script to load the blog, news and twitter data into R
2. Cleaning data.R contains the script to clean and better understand the data
3. corpusv4.R contains the script to create the language model
4. week2_progress_reportv3.Rmd is the markdown file containing the week2 progress report
5. PNW contains:
- Predict_Next_Word_presentation which is posted in Rpubs
- app.R is the shiny app
- predictv4.R is the next_word_prediction algorithm
- data contains the language model, ngram_models.rds

The link to the shiny app: https://jvanstee.shinyapps.io/predict_next_word32/

The link to the Rpubs presentation: https://github.com/jvanstee/datasciencecoursera/tree/master/Capstone
